description:
Hordy`s rampant use of the energy steroid makes him bigger, stronger, and scarier than ever before! The Fish-Man princes join the battle, but even they may not be strong enough to stop Hordy`s onslaught!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le combat final commence ! La place de la Thon-Corde
The Battle Is On! At Conchchorde Plaza!
決戦始まる ギョンコルド広場!
